description:
Kouno Yui`s hidden identity is that she is an important member of http://anidb.net/ch40609 [Wiz-Dom]; http://anidb.net/ch5905 [Lemon] is her apprentice in both of her roles.
Yui wants control over http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] for his powers as mindbreaker. For this purpose she manipulates http://anidb.net/ch5906 [Asumi] (a member of WIZ-DOM`s rival faction http://anidb.net/ch40611 [E.G.O.]) to gain influence over Kyouta`s future.
name: Kouno Yui
